eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Interface FTPConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, FileAccess

    public interface FTPConnection
extends java.io.Closeable, FileAccess
    Represents an FTP(s) or an SFTP connection with standard file and directory functions.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.
